product_name: Partners West Hikes and Climbs to Bitterroot Mountain Summits
long_description: Hikes and Climbs to Bitterroot Mountain Summits offers a thoroughly researched guide to the Bitterroot Mountains with instruction geared to beginning and intermediate climbers.
